extendedInfo.description: Love candies but tired of making the same old candies over and over? If so, then Jewel Candy Maker is just what youâve been looking for! Itâs a jewels candy making game where you make edible rubies, amethysts, emeralds, sapphires, diamonds and more, all in shapes of your own choosing of jewels.Make these irresistibly sweet candies from a selection of fruits like strawberries, cherries, grapes and even lemon. Turn your jewels candy syrup into solid, edible gems by pouring it into an assortment of molds, ranging from simple square shaped jewels to gems in the shape of a star or even a marble. Pack them up neatly in fancy boxes and decorate them with covers and ribbons. A wide range of covers and ribbons are available, with more purchasable in the in-game Store along with different molds and candy flavors.It doesnât take a master chef to make these magnificent jewels. Cooking candy jewels is incredibly easy and a lot of fun. Just add water, sugar, corn syrup and the fruit flavor you want to use to a cooking utensil. Stir the mixture and let boil for a while. When itâs done, pour it into molds, wait for it to cool down, and âVoilaâ! Your candy jewels are ready!Be sure not to overcook your candy jewels though, and donât make a mess when pouring your candy syrup into molds. If you donât pour the syrup into molds neatly, the candy jewels will come out as one large chunk. Youâll crush the candy jewels if you try to separate them!===== FEATURES =====- Attractive, colorful visuals.- Countless possibilities â More than a hundred different possible combinations to make every box of candy jewels different.- Kids friendly content â A real eye candy for kids - Bring out the creativity in your children! No violence or monsters or zombies or scares.- Unlockable Store items for your candy jewels â More molds for different shapes, more boxes to pack your gem-like candies in and more ribbons to gift wrap it with.- Share with friends â Share your candy jewels with your friends on Facebook.============================================================PRIVACY POLICY:As a designer of kidsâ games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. You can read our privacy policy here: www.nuttyapps.com/privacypolicy.IN-APP PURCHASES:Â This app lets you purchase digital content using actual money. On Google Wallet, you can configure parental controls to avoid unintentional purchases.NEED HELP?Contact us with any questions or comments: nuttyfeedback@gmail.com============================================================NOTE: Not all items will be available for donut making at launch. Will be pushed in later versionsApp supports Android 2.2 (Froyo) to Android 4.x Ice Cream Sandwich and Jellybeans. DISCLAIMER:All BGMs are the property of Kevin MacLeod.
